member.name: M:SIKOSI.Sample07_EncryptedChat.Controllers.AccountController.GetBytesFromBody
member.summary: Tries to retrieve a byte array out of the body. Returns null if it fails to retrieve a byte array.
member.returns: The retrieved byte array sent in the body, null if no byte array can be retrieved.
